ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | coe1fval.a | |- A = ( coe1 ` F ) |
| 2 |  | coe1f.b | |- B = ( Base ` P ) |
| 3 |  | coe1f.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 4 |  | coe1f.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_coe1f | |- ( F e. B -> A : NN0 --> K ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_ffvelrnda | |- ( ( F e. B /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( A ` N ) e. K ) |
